Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
I came here to stock up on saleable products,
but I couldn't find anything good.

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
I didn't find what I was looking for, but I found
something else that's just as good.

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
I finally found what I've been looking for. Time to
take it back home and sell it off.

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
What a nice town this is. You can buy anything,
and the nature is gorgeous.

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
It's not always easy to know when to buy and
when to sell, is it?

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
If I sell my stock when the price is too low, I
lose money, right?
